text.headline: Introduction to Programming
text.text: My entry into the programming world began with learning their fundamentals during undergraduate years

text.headline: Starting the personal projects journey
text.text: After developing a strong relation with Python Language, I started working on various personal projects to increase my grip on it.

text.headline: Getting into Machine Learning
text.text: Started getting familiar with Machine Learning during 3rd year of undergraduate studies and developed a serious liking for it!

text.headline: 1st Internship
text.text: To get some professional experience under my belt, I joined Akash Technolabs as a Python Django Intern during summer break.

text.headline: Joined Omdena as a MLE Intern
text.text: Got a chance to be a part of a real world live project at Omdena, working as a Machine Learning Engineer and lead the data preprocessing team.

text.headline: Python Developer Internship
text.text: Summer internship at Skyscend Business Solutions as a Python Developer.

text.headline: Interning as a Data Analyst
text.text: This was a remote internship at Saint Louis University. Managed dual internships as well as college studies.

text.headline: Started Data Science Lab program
text.text: Started the WorldQuant University's Applied Data Science Lab program. It consists of 8 real world Data Science projects, which I completed in 6 months.

text.headline: Data Science Internship
text.text: This was the first internship where I got to apply all my Python and ML fundamentals and got to learn about applications of Data Science in the professional woarld.

text.headline: Joined Marwadi Infosys Inc as an IT Consultant
text.text: My role at MIINC involved Strategic Planning & Business Development, Operations Management & Service Delivery and Client Relationship Management.

text.headline: Started my Masters Journey at UT Arlington
text.text: My decision to pursue further studies brought me to UT Arlington in Texas, USA, where I'm currently pursuing my MS in Comp Sci

text.headline: UTA Datathon Oragnizing Committee Member
text.text: Started working in the Challenges team developing ML/AI based challenges within the Datathon team for the hackathon.
